title: Hard To Play Football Without A Quarterback
description: Hot Takedown looks at the NFL’s uneven attempts to manage the pandemic and a historic first for college football.
itunes:author: FiveThirtyEight, 538, Neil Paine, Geoff Foster, Sara Ziegler
itunes:subtitle: Hot Takedown looks at the NFL’s uneven attempts to manage the pandemic and a historic first for Power Five football.
itunes:summary: Hot Takedown looks at the NFL’s uneven attempts to manage the pandemic and a historic first for college football.
content:encoded: Hot Takedown looks at the NFL’s uneven attempts to manage the pandemic and a historic first for college football.
